## Testing

### Test Coverage

- [ ] All tests pass: `npm test`
- [ ] Coverage maintained/improved: `npm run test:coverage`
- [ ] Added tests for new code

### Quality Checks

- [ ] Linting passes: `npm run lint`
- [ ] Type checking passes: `npm run typecheck`
- [ ] Formatting correct: `npm run format:check`
- [ ] Build succeeds: `npm run build`

### Manual Testing

```typescript
// Example of manual testing performed
import { SDC4Validator } from './src';

const validator = new SDC4Validator({ schema: './test.xsd' });
// ... test code
```

- [ ] I have read [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)

- [ ] My code follows the TypeScript style guide
- [ ] I have added tests for my changes
- [ ] All tests pass locally
- [ ] I have updated documentation
